QuestData.Title: Most Loyal
QuestData.Description:
The Dark Lady anticipated this as a possible outcome. She has prepared a contingency plan to deal with it accordingly.
You are to rendezvous with her in the Ghostlands. Take this hearthstone. It is good for one more use.
She will meet you near Windrunner Spire.

Objectives.Objective: Use Cracked Hearthstone to reach Tranquillien
